Title: Makita Job Site DAB+ Digital Radio MR003GZ 02 Olive Green 40v Max AM FM XGT Bare
Description:
Makita Radio MR003G is a job site radio that is able to receive Digital Audio Broadcasting (DAB/ DAB+) and has been developed based on DMR110
 
A powerful, versatile radio that fits in with your 40v Max system
 
Capable of receiving DAB / DAB+ (Digital Audio Broadcasts)
Micro USB port for software upgrade
Compatible with XGT, LXT and CXT batteries
AC adaptor jack
Carry handle with built-in FM antenna
IP65 rated dust and shower-proof construction
2x speaker stereo system.
Runs up to 34 hours with an 40Vmax XGT Li-ion 4.0 Ah battery
Elastomer bumpers and metal pipes protect against rough handling
AUX-IN jack for connecting to external audio source
Digital Tuner with LCD Backlit Display
Iluminated control buttons and dial for improved visibility
 
Bare Unit - Battery & charger not included
 
Part of the limited edition olive green 18v lxt outdoor and leisure range 
 
Please note this is a FM + DAM Model - it does not have Bluetooth Connectivity as standard
